hero.title: The magic of Christmas under the lighthouse of Alexandroupolis

section-header.title: Welcome to The Christmas Lighthouse
section-header.description: Discover a magical holiday escape at the Port of Alexandroupoli. Our park is a festive wonderland filled with enchanting lights, joyful music, and unforgettable experiences for all ages.

info-card.title: Park Information
info-card.description: Located at the heart of the city's port, we transform the waterfront into a Christmas dream.

location.title: Location
location.description: Port of Alexandroupoli, under the Lighthouse

section-header.title: Our main experiences
section-header.description: From graceful skating to festive celebrations, our magical experiences brings the holiday spirit to life for visitors of all ages. Discover the enclosed ice rink, join our heartwarming Christmas parade, and enjoy a full season of interactive events with Santa, elves, mascots, and more.

ice-rink-card.title: Enclosed ice rink
ice-rink-card.description: Glide across our fully enclosed ice rink, surrounded shimmering lights, festive décor, and the sound of holiday music filling the air.

parade-card.title: Christmas parade
parade-card.description: Celebrate the season with Santa, lively elves, sparkling costumes, and captivating performances, all dedicated to raising funds for children and families in need.

events-card.title: Interactive events
events-card.description: Dive into a full lineup of festive activities—live storytelling, creative workshops, holiday crafts, face painting, and surprises for all ages.

section-header.title: 5th Christmas charity parade
section-header.description: This year’s beloved holiday celebration brought Alexandroupoli together once again with music, costumes, mascots, and Santa, uniting families in support of children and those in need.

info-card.title: Sunday, November 30, 2025 — 18:30
info-card.subtitle: Alexandroupoli’s biggest Christmas parade concluded successfully!
info-card.description: Held with the support of the <axd>Municipality of Alexandroupoli</axd>, the 5th Christmas Charity Parade filled the city streets with festive music, colourful characters, and joyful performances. The celebration continued with the official Christmas tree lighting, fireworks, and a holiday party at the park. Visitors supported the cause through food donations and the purchase of official Christmas accessories, with all proceeds benefiting the <sos>SOS Children’s Villages</sos>.

parade.video-description: Watch highlights from the 5th Christmas Charity Parade in Alexandroupoli

section-header.title: Daily Christmas activities
section-header.description: Discover the magical surprises waiting for you every day. Each date includes a morning activity and an afternoon event, giving families two unique moments of festive fun throughout the season.

22/11.morning: The Christmas Lighthouse is here! We’re waiting for you with super surprises!
22/11.afternoon: Ho! Ho! Ho! Santa is waiting for you with the most beautiful Christmas stories!

23/11.morning: Santa’s post office is ready to receive your letters!
23/11.afternoon: Santa Gallery: Paint together with Santa and decorate his little house with your artwork!

29/11.morning: How many gifts can Santa’s sack fit? Guess!

30/11.morning: Santa’s elf is waiting for you for Christmas face painting!
30/11.afternoon: The Christmas Lighthouse parade has become a tradition! Joining us: Santa with his elf, Olaf, the Minion, Mickey, Minnie, Pikachu, T-Rex, our living Christmas tree, the Panda, and the Grinch. Come march with us for a good cause!

6/12.afternoon: Fairy tales from around the world, told by Santa

7/12.morning: Santa lost Rudolph! What do we do now?
7/12.afternoon: Mascots on stage! Your favorite characters from The Christmas Lighthouse are waiting for you for lots of dancing and games!

13/12.afternoon: Santa is in trouble! He can only make it with your help!

14/12.afternoon: Make a wish with a teddy bear for a good cause! Get your teddy from the cashier and come to the ice rink for a magical night of wishes!

20/12.morning: Making Christmas cards together with Santa!
20/12.afternoon: Santa, can you teach me how to climb down chimneys like you?

21/12.morning: Miss Santa is preparing super competitions! Who will be the winner?
21/12.afternoon: The toy workshop has opened! The elves are waiting for you!

24/12.afternoon: Mickey Mouse is dressed in his festive outfit and waiting for you for lots of fun!!!

25/12.morning: The Grinch is coming to “steal” Christmas!

26/12.morning: Mickey Mouse is dressed for the holidays and waiting for you with big hugs!

27/12.afternoon: The chief elf is organizing the… Christmas Exathlon! Take part too!

28/12.morning: Pikachu, our favorite Pokémon, is coming to The Christmas Lighthouse for new adventures.
28/12.afternoon: Lots of dancing and games with our little elf!

29/12.morning: A fluffy panda is turning The Christmas Lighthouse upside down!

30/12.morning: What’s yellow and wears blue clothes?? Of course, our favorite Minion!
30/12.afternoon: A little angel is coming to The Christmas Lighthouse!

31/12.morning: Santa has a lot of work! Will he manage to deliver all the gifts to our little friends?
31/12.afternoon: The elves’ list is ready! Will you be on the naughty list or the nice list?

1/1.morning: Happy New Year from The Christmas Lighthouse! Santa is waiting for you to wish you a wonderful new year!
1/1.afternoon: New Year stories that only Santa knows how to tell!

2/1.morning: Santa is getting ready for the North Pole!
2/1.afternoon: Reindeer, sleigh, jingle bells—check! Santa, have a safe trip!
